rows.label: tlk70000067_02_msg0001
rows.name:
It's pretty scary outside the village.
Are those bandits still about?

rows.label: tlk70000067_02_msg0002
rows.name:
They're some nasty folk. Quite a
few times I've had to give shelter
to people fleeing them...

rows.label: tlk70000067_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The bandits are after Core Crystals
they can sell on the black market.
It's terrible.

rows.label: tlk70000067_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I reckon they'll get caught before too
long now that Shin's here in Iira!
